name: Ai To Noroi: School Simulator
summary: This is a story about 6 girls, very close friends, which were fond of mythical and demonic mysteries. One day they went into an old book store, and found a very old book. Despite it was incredibly expensive, they bought it. Then, one of the girls was chosen to keep the book at home. Serious consequences followed...
